authors.bio: A passionate coder and tech enthusiast, always eager to learn and explore the latest in AI and software development.
Lover of code, coffee, and cats. Sharing my journey through tech and life, one post at a time.
Full-stack developer with a passion for open-source projects and community-driven development.

posts.title: My Favorite Tech Stack
posts.content:
Hey everyone! John here, and today I wanted to share my favorite tech stack:

- **Frontend**: React, Tailwind CSS
- **Backend**: Node.js, Express
- **Database**: PostgreSQL
- **CI/CD**: GitHub Actions, Docker

Feel free to share your stack in the comments! ğŸ˜Š
